resources.string:
If connected to PC, fingerprint sensor and USB devices
 are not available.

If not connected to PC, fingerprint sensor and USB devices
 are available.
Fingerprint sensor and USB devices not available
Reference Fingerprint sensor code with full features\n and documentation is located in MorphoSmart SDK\n (in MorphoSample folder), which is included in ID Screen SDK.

Warning: cannot connect to fingerprint sensor.

Please open item "Peripheral Management" in this application main menu and check following settings :
	- Fingerprint sensor should be enabled
	- USB mode should be set to "Host". Or it should be set to "Auto" and PC shouldn't be connected to tablet.

Please also check that no other fingerprint sensor is connected to tablet.
Preflash and flash brightness can be checked by taking a picture.\nPlease open Camera application below.

Your device is not running IDEMIA secure firmware (version Sxx-y).\nSome features will not be available or will not work properly.\nPlease update your device to IDEMIA secure firmware to use all features.
